text: Airexpo is a French airshow created in 1987. It is the third most important airshow of France. Airexpo, le plus grand meeting du sud-ouest It is organized by the students of the universities École nationale de l'aviation civile and those of the Institut supérieur de l'aéronautique et de l'espace. 26ème édition du meeting aérien Airexpo sur l’aérodrome de Muret-Lherm (31) It is yearly organized and most of the time on the Muret - Lherm Aerodrome. Air- expo fait sont retour à Muret == Presentation == The aircraft are representative of the world of aviation, from the Supermarine Spitfire to the F-18 Super Hornet, through the little Robin DR400. Proof of its quality and originality, the airliners are also regularly represented with the participation of Airbus and ATR, with the Airbus A380 Muret. Airexpo : l'A380 en vedette and A340-600 or the ATR 72-500. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Aviation in France Category:Festivals in France Category:French Civil Aviation University Category:1987 establishments in France
title: Airexpo
